description.description: 这部分用作记录，无实际用途

type-enum.style: [代码格式化] Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)
type-enum.refactor: [代码重构（不改变外部行为）] A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature
type-enum.perf: [（代码或性能优化）优化] A code change that improves performance
type-enum.test: Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests
type-enum.build: Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies (example scopes: gulp, broccoli, npm)
type-enum.ci: Changes to our CI configuration files and scripts (example scopes: Travis, Circle, BrowserStack, SauceLabs)
type-enum.chore: Other changes that don't modify src or test files
